snippet.title: Season Three Cinematic Trailer | Call of Duty®: Black Ops Cold War & Warzone™
snippet.description:
As Stitch continues his revenge against Russell Adler, two agents of Perseus descend on Mount Yamantau to set his master plan in motion. The fate of the Cold War now lies in Verdansk.

Season Three begins April 22 in #BlackOpsColdWar and #Warzone.
